Package com.picocontainer.behaviors

BehaviorFactories make Behaviors which change aspects of component implementations and instances.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Intercepting.Controller  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBehavior  
    AbstractBehavior.AbstractChangedBehavior<T>
    Component adapter which decorates another adapter.
    AdaptingBehavior  
    Automating  
    Automating.Automated<T>  
    Behaviors
    Static collection of factory methods for different BehaviourFactory implementations.
    Caching
    factory class creating cached behaviours
    Caching.Cached<T>
    ComponentAdapter implementation that caches the component instance.
    Decorating
    Behavior for Decorating.
    Decorating.Decorated<T>  
    FieldDecorating
    Behavior for Field Decorating.
    FieldDecorating.FieldDecorated<T>  
    Guarding
    factory class creating guard behaviour
    Guarding.Guarded<T>
    behaviour for allows components to be guarded by another component
    ImplementationHiding  
    ImplementationHiding.HiddenImplementation<T>
    This component adapter makes it possible to hide the implementation of a real subject (behind a proxy) provided the key is an interface.
    Intercepting  
    Intercepting.ControllerImpl  
    Intercepting.ControllerWrapper  
    Intercepting.Intercepted<T>  
    Intercepting.InterceptorThreadLocal  
    Locking
    This behavior factory provides java.util.concurrent locks.
    Locking.Locked<T>  
    OptInCaching
    Behavior that turns off Caching behavior by default.
    PropertyApplying
    A ComponentFactory that creates PropertyApplying.PropertyApplicator instances.
    PropertyApplying.PropertyApplicator<T>
    Decorating component adapter that can be used to set additional properties on a component in a bean style.
    Storing  
    Storing.Stored<T>  
    Storing.Stored.Instance<T>  
    Storing.StoreThreadLocal<T>  
    Storing.StoreWrapper  
    Synchronizing
    This behavior factory provides synchronized wrappers to control access to a particular component.
    Synchronizing.Synchronized<T>
    Component Adapter that uses java synchronized around getComponentInstance().
    ThreadCaching  
    ThreadCaching.ThreadCached<T>
    This behavior supports caches values per thread.

Package com.picocontainer.behaviors Description

BehaviorFactories make Behaviors which change aspects of component implementations and instances.
